name: Niñoid
description:
Your cat Kiska is very curious and has decided to venture into a strange looking temple. Unlock new abilities as you explore the temple in search of your missing kitty.

Move with the left and right arrow keys and jump with A (Z on a keyboard). Press the up and down arrow keys to climb up and down ladders. Press start to save your game and select to teleport outside or to different rooms in the temple.

As you unlock new abilities, you will need to use more buttons. When prompted to use button B, that will be X on a keyboard.

This game can be Played in English and Spanish.

Thanks to Mr. V for the music and Coffe Bat for the sound effects. This game was developed using GB Studio with art made in Aseprite.  The game manual was made using Soully's template. You can download it or read it here.
